hints.content:
$\qquad \begin{align}&\green{8} \text{ monkeys with bow ties}\\
+&  \underline{\blue4 \text{ monkeys with long ties}}\\
=&\pink{12} \text{ monkeys in total}\end{align}$
$\pink{12}$ monkeys live in the Fancy Forest.

question.content:
The monkeys in the Fancy Forest always wear ties. $8$ of them wear bow ties and $4$ of them wear long ties.

**How many monkeys live in the Fancy Forest? ** 

[[☃ input-number 1]] monkeys
